message: Knowledge of heaven and hell, Angels and watchers has been revealed in the bible. Though some have had glimpses of these realms within our realm, Jesus revealed he alone is the way the truth and the life, he made the way for us to enter this wonderful paradise by sacrificing his life to bring down the barrier of our fallen state and the judgement that was against us. In fact, we experience some of his gifts now in receiving communication from him, healings and deliverance.

seems certain people are trying to figure out everything that trump's campaign and trump got wrong during the campaign to try and do something to keep him out of office is why i mentioned it.

What an amazing story! 22 people die every day waiting for a transplant. More than 120,000 people are waiting for a transplant in the U.S. A person is added to the waitlist every 10 minutes. One donor can save 8 lives, and improve 50+. DonaeLifeWisconsin.org

How anyone can say President Obama is anything but amazing blows my mind. He has worked tirelessly to improve the quality of our lives. He has led the world with class and diplomacy. He has not had any support from a Congress with a 13% approval rating. God bless him and his family.
